Carga RIPS asociados a una factura electrónica

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"rips":{"type":"object","description":"Objeto complejo que contiene la información de RIPS","properties":{"numDocumentoIdObligado":{"type":"string","example":"901355357"},"numFactura":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"example":"SETP990000103"},"tipoNota":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"example":"RS"},"numNota":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"example":"1"},"usuarios":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object"}}}},"xmlFevFile":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Base64 string del archivo XML de la factura (AttachedDocument). Null para RIPS sin factura."}},"title":"RipsRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

>
